subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Arthur Abraham’s defense of his International Boxing Federation middleweight title against Raúl Márquez on Saturday in Bamberg, Germany, has been postponed because Abraham has come down with the flu. The fight has been rescheduled for Nov. 8, also in Bamberg.
